relation: Complete all 18 race missions. The car will appear at (82, 19) on the last island, where the last set of races began.
Complete 50 Taxi missions and it will appear at your Portland hideout.
pageTitle: Hints - GTA Wiki, the Grand Theft Auto Wiki - GTA IV, San Andreas, Vice City, cars, vehicles, cheats and more

textAfterTable: As you collect the hidden packages, weapons will be delivered to your hideout. Unlockable How to Unlock Handgun collect 10 packages Uzi collect 20 packages body armour collect 30 packages shotgun collect 40 packages molotovs collect 60 packages grenades collect 50 packages assualt rifle collect 70 packages mini gun collect 80 packages rocket laucher collect 90 packages $1,000,000 100 packages Mission Rewards Unlockable How to Unlock Flame Thrower Complete 20 Fire Truck missions on each island Health Pickup at hideout Unlockable Health Pickup Unlockable Cars Unlockable How to Unlock F-1 Racer Complete all 18 race missions.
